definition: Huaping county in Lijiang 麗江|丽江[Li4 jiang1], Yunnan

sentences.english: This region of slow percentage increase is called the plateau .
sentences.chinese: 这个增长百分率缓慢的区域称为坪。

sentences.english: Tidal sedimentary is the main deposition in the barrier coast system.
sentences.chinese: 障壁海岸体系主要为潮坪沉积。

sentences.english: For the production of high gloss cement base ping.
sentences.chinese: 用于制作高光泽度的水泥基地坪。

sentences.english: Much construction experience was accumulated through it successful application in Xiaping Bridge engineering.
sentences.chinese: 该新技术在下坪大桥成功应用，积累一定施工经验。

sentences.english: This change was actually fundamental ever since I moved here in Huangjiaoping.
sentences.chinese: 自从来到黄桷坪，作品有了一个根本性转变。

sentences.english: It's a hot day. It's been too tired to many hikers just passing Chi Gu Ping village.
sentences.chinese: 天气热之过，刚过赤菇坪村就把人累得一塌糊涂了。

sentences.english: In the county seat 23 kilometers away from the door Renjiaping usually forbidden to enter.
sentences.chinese: 设在离县城两三公里任家坪的大门平时严禁进入。

sentences.english: Tangjiaping molybdenum is a typical porphyry type molybdenum deposit.
sentences.chinese: 汤家坪钼矿属典型的斑岩型钼矿床。

sentences.english: The effect of the exploitation of the pyrite ( and coal) deposit at Huangchangping in west Hubei on the environment is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了鄂西磺厂坪硫铁矿开发对环境产生的影响。

sentences.english: Who is the master of Jizulotus mountain?
sentences.chinese: 鸡足山木香坪的主人是谁？

sentences.english: The gypsum deposit has in higher intertidal flat of the suprat- ndal and intertidal zone.
sentences.chinese: 石膏矿床形成于潮上带及潮间带高潮坪。

sentences.english: Some burials were excavated at the Baotaping site, Fengjie County in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 2003年在奉节县宝塔坪遗址发掘一批墓葬。

sentences.english: Chanziping gold deposit belongs to altered rock type one in fracture zone occurred in Banxi Group.
sentences.chinese: 铲子坪金矿为板溪群构造破碎带蚀变岩型金矿床。

sentences.english: The configuration and performance of communication of integrated-automated network of Dongping hydropower station are described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了洞坪电站综合自动化网络的构成及其性能。

sentences.english: Do the greens drain well internally?
sentences.chinese: 果岭坪床内部排水系统是否良好？

sentences.english: Suspend-dome structure is adopted in Pingshan Basketball Gymnasium for Universidad 2011 Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 深圳坪山体育馆屋顶采用新颖的弦支穹顶结构体系。

ridge between fields/row of crops/grave mound/old variant of 壟|垄
